21 FEB 2014 • article

Rest in Peace, my friend!

Now the question is where is justice done? What we wanted was just justice for our brother who lost his life due to negligence of some higher authorities. The issue of the 10 degree leaning of the wall was even raised by the faculty just 3 months ago. Even after that also no action was taken. Is this too much to ask? Some of our seniors who fighted and leaded us from the beginning of the event are now the new victims. Our honorable hero has sent a clear message to all of us that nobody can touch him.
